# Laser Pulse Compressors Tender Announcement
## Tender Details
- **Tender Reference**: cb-149-94065224
- **Solicitation Number**: 24-58036
- **Publication Date**: 2024-06-27
- **Tender Closing Date**: 2024-07-12T14:00:00
- **Procurement Category**: Goods (GD)

## Short Description
The National Research Council (NRC) of Canada is seeking two (2) Laser Pulse Compressors to enhance its research capabilities. The compressors will be based on multi-pass, constant-pressure gas cell technology and must be compatible with the NRC's existing N2 Photonics laser pulse compressors and research equipment.

## Technical Requirements
- The compressors must meet the technical requirements listed below for each wavelength (1030 nm and 2000 nm).
  - Pulse energy: 800 µJ
  - Average power: 80 W
  - Repetition rate: 100 kHz
  - Wavelength: 1030 nm or 2000 nm
  - Pulse duration: 90 %
  - Refractive quality (M2): <1.3
  - Maximal footprint: <36x25 cm^2

## Trade Agreements
This procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:
- Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
- World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
- Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
- Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)

## Bidding Details
- The tender is now closed.
- Any interested party who can provide a compliant solution may submit a statement of capabilities on or before July 12, 2024, 2:00 p.m. eastern time.
- Statements of capabilities can be submitted to Lou Helbling at luiz.helbling@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca.

## Other Important Information
- This contract is governed by the Canadian government's contracting regulations.
- The contracting party is the National Research Council (NRC) of Canada.

## Contact Information
- Lou Helbling, Senior Contracting Officer
- luiz.helbling@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca
- (343) 630-4187
